DOC.brief_summary: Determine the effect of Vancomycin Powder added to the surgical wound at closure on surgical infection rates.
DOC.brief_title: Surgical Infection Rates With Adjunct Vancomycin Compared to Standard Peri-Operative IV Antibiotics
DOC.detailed_description: Study will be blinded and randomized 1:1 to either Vancomycin Powder at closure or no vancomycin powder at closure.
DOC.criteria: All adult, 18 years or greater undergoing posterior approach spinal surgery Prisoner, pregnant women, patient under the age of 18, those of diminished decision making capacity. patients with known reaction to Vancomycin. patients having surgery specifically for spine infection patients having ADCF or ALIF
